abstract: French government releases graphic video showing clips of Islamic State brutalities in effort to counteract arguments used by jihadists to lure in disaffected youth.
lead_paragraph: The video, showing clips of executions, wounded children and crucifixions, is aimed at countering recruitment efforts by the Islamic State and other terrorist groups.

byline.original: By DAN BILEFSKY and MAÏA de la BAUME

snippet: The video, showing clips of executions, wounded children and crucifixions, is aimed at countering recruitment efforts by the Islamic State and other terrorist groups.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: French Video Tries to Blunt Jihad’s Allure Among Youth
headline.print_headline: French Video Tries to Blunt Jihad’s Allure Among Youth
